title: Ep. 133 - Why Mass Shootings Happen
description:
After the horrific shooting at a synagogue over the weekend, people are asking why these tragedies keep happening. Obviously bigotry and hatred are part of the story, but there’s something else. We’ll talk about the other ingredient that leads to slaughter.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
